version_description: Updated Umm Al-Qura's Isha time during Ramadan

Watch Complication! - Guidance now offers a watch complication so you can always see prayer times on your watch
New prayer time engine - Guidance now uses our new open source prayer time library: Adhan

Watch Complication! - Guidance now offers a watch complication so you can always see prayer times on your watch
New prayer time engine - Guidance now uses our new open source prayer time library: Adhan

Guidance is back!

Guidance 4.0 brings you an all new interface that looks great on old and new devices alike.

This update also brings:
- Support for all the new watch complications
- New full adhan alert option (limited to one of the audio options)
- Updated today widget

Sometimes with a big update, things get overlooked. But alhamdullilah Guidance 4.1 is here to resolve many of those issues.

We have improved the widget to show countdown or next prayer time in the compact size. Also, you can tap to toggle between countdown and next time or fix it in one mode or the other.

The classic default alert sound has been restored to its rightful place. 

Masjid search is back and is conveniently accessible from the Qibla map. 

JazakAllahu khairun for your kind words and support. Please consider leaving a review on the App Store to help others find this app.


إِنَّ فِي خَلْقِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَاخْتِلَافِ اللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهَارِ لَآيَاتٍ لِّأُولِي الْأَلْبَابِ 
Indeed, in the creation of the heavens and the earth and the alternation of the night and the day are signs for those of understanding.
3:190

- Added French translation
- Improved reliability of the Watch Complication
- Fixed Fajr and Sunrise reminder notifications
- Added back system notification sound option in addition to the classic chime
Fixed issue with Umm Al-Qura Isha time

New Light Theme option!

New countdown mode for Apple Watch complications!

You can now hear the full adhan if the app is open when a notification comes up or the app is launched by tapping on a notification.

New infographic watch face complication now shows the time of the next prayer.

- Now you can change the watch complication mode directly from the watch app, just force touch in the Guidance watch app  to access settings.
- Added support for dynamic text
- Translation fixes

Today widget now supports dark mode in iOS 13
App theme can be set to match system theme
Qibla map now shows the angle value
Fixed a bug where changing the hijri date would cause the day of the week to be incorrect
Fixed an issue with watch complications on the California watch face
